ValidationRule.description: Prevents Users from Closing a Support Request
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') || CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'System Administrator'))
&&
ISCHANGED(Status__c)
&&
$User.CalAtlas_Business_Team_Member__c = false
&&
!ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Added to a Project')
&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Accepted') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Confirmed'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only a System Administrator Can Change the Status to the value you selected
